identity.name: LR Energy SCADA
identity.concept: The Glass Control Room - A clean, high-visibility interface that feels like a modern cockpit.

structure.kpi_section: col-span-12 grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-6 gap-4
structure.side_panel: col-span-12 lg:col-span-4 row-span-2 flex flex-col gap-4

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-lg overflow-hidden
cards.header: px-5 py-3 border-b border-slate-100 flex justify-between items-center bg-slate-50/50

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-600 text-white hover:bg-emerald-700 shadow-sm font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-all
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-3 py-2

inputs.base: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-emerald-600 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tanks.container: relative w-24 h-40 bg-slate-100 border-2 border-slate-300 rounded-lg overflow-hidden
tanks.liquid: absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-full transition-all duration-1000 ease-in-out opacity-80

universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' font for all numeric values to ensure tabular alignment and readability.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0f172a) for high contrast text.
All cards must have a subtle 1px border (border-slate-200) to define boundaries clearly in light mode.
Status indicators should always use both color and icon/text for accessibility.
Animations should be subtle (0.2s - 0.3s) and purposeful, not distracting.
Ensure high contrast for data values against backgrounds.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds of data cards; keep them flat and clean.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'typeface-manrope' or import it from Google Fonts in index.css. 2. Update tailwind.config.js to include the new font family and colors. 3. Refactor the layout to use the Bento Grid system. 4. Redesign the components (KPISummary, TankLevels, etc.) to match the 'Glass Control Room' aesthetic. 5. Ensure the LR Energy logo colors (Emerald/Violet) are used strategically for branding.
